rows.label: qst102714_msg001
rows.name: どうしたイオン？(仮)

rows.label: qst102714_msg002
rows.name: おじいちゃん　これあげる(仮)

rows.label: qst102714_msg003
rows.name: ありがとう(仮)

rows.label: qst102714_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, you brought the medicine!
Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst102714_msg0002
rows.name: Come on, let's take it to Grandpa.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0050
rows.name: *cough* *cough*

rows.label: qst102714_msg0051
rows.name:
Sorry about that...
What brings you fellas here, then?

rows.label: qst102714_msg0052
rows.name:
I think I'm getting weaker
by the day...

rows.label: qst102714_msg0053
rows.name:
Might have something to do with
old Marveni kicking the bucket.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0054
rows.name:
I just hope I can finish writing
Vandham's story before I go...
It's gonna be a close one.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0055
rows.name:
Listen, Grandpa. These guys
brought a cure for you.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0056
rows.name:
And Hikari-chan says she'll stabilize
your ether flow!

rows.label: qst102714_msg0057
rows.name:
I hope you're ready, Minochi. I'll start
as soon as you drink the medicine.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0058
rows.name:
Hikari... I see...
So you finally...

rows.label: qst102714_msg0059
rows.name: Ion, pass me the medicine here.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0060
rows.name: Okay!

rows.label: qst102714_msg0061
rows.name: That should just about do it.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0101
rows.name:
Grandpa...
How do you feel?

rows.label: qst102714_msg0102
rows.name:
My body feels warmer...
I think it's a little easier to breathe.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0103
rows.name: Really? That's great!

rows.label: qst102714_msg0104
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0105
rows.name:
I may not be able to escape
death's grip forever...

rows.label: qst102714_msg0106
rows.name:
But I'll make sure as hell I last long
enough to see my script make it to
the big stage.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0107
rows.name:
Besides...
You lot are an important part
of Vandham's story.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0108
rows.name: I still have to see how your act ends.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0109
rows.name: It's not much, but take this as thanks.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0110
rows.name:
I could never master it myself.
Maybe you'll do better.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0111
rows.name: Thank you for everything!

rows.label: qst102714_msg0112
rows.name: Right!
